court.center: Court of Appeals of Texas, Fifth District, Dallas.

opinion.posture:
Original Proceeding from the 162nd Judicial District Court, Dallas County, Texas, Trial Court Cause No. 04-08456-I.
Writ of Mandamus Denied.
opinion.panel: Before Justices WRIGHT, O'NEILL, and LANG.
opinion.opinion_text: Relator contends the trial judge erred in denying her request for a temporary restraining order. Based on the record presented, we conclude the trial judge did not abuse his discretion in denying relator's request for a temporary restraining order. Accordingly, relator's motion for emergency stay and petition for writ of mandamus are DENIED. See Tex.R.App.P. 52.8(a).
